intro: Antheilema, commonly known as the starflower, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its showy, star-shaped flowers that typically bloom in shades of yellow or white. The plants are often found in moist, temperate regions and have lance-shaped leaves with a distinctive ribbed texture. Antheilema species are known for their ability to thrive in partial shade and well-drained soil. They are also valued for their ornamental appeal and are sometimes used in traditional medicine.
